columns.Submission_ID: The unique identifier for each submission.
columns.Scores: The numeric score awarded to the submission.
columns.Author: The name of the person who authored the submission.
columns.College: The educational institution associated with the author.

submission.table_description: The table tracks submissions and their evaluation details.

columns.Submission_ID: The unique identifier for each submission in the acceptance process.
columns.Workshop_ID: The unique identifier for each workshop associated with submissions.
columns.Result: The outcome of the submission, either accepted or rejected.

Acceptance.table_description: The table tracks the acceptance results of submissions to workshops.

columns.Workshop_ID: The unique identifier for each workshop.
columns.Date: The date on which the workshop is scheduled.
columns.Venue: The location where the workshop will take place.
columns.Name: The title or name of the workshop.

workshop.table_description: The table captures details about various workshops.
